name: Clearing in a Forest
description:
You wake up and groggily open your eyes. You're laying on your back looking at a green forest canopy overhead and can see patches of pale blue sky above. You have a pounding headache. You pick yourself up and manage to get on your feet.
You are in a small clearing in a dense forest. There's a small hole in the ground nearby. An overgrown trail leads through the trees to the north. Another dirt path leads to the east.

args: updateRoomDesc:ROOM:You are in a small clearing in a dense forest. There's a small hole in the ground nearby. An overgrown trail leads through the trees to the north. Another dirt path leads to the east.
A slight glimmer in the air dissipates as you get your bearings. Before you know it, it's gone.

look: Soft soil is piled next to a 1-foot-wide hole that is only 6 inches deep. At the bottom of the hole is a small, smooth stone.
It's a small, smooth stone that could easily fit in your hand.
